short_summary: Replacement of heating boilers at U66 and U66A buildings, National Research Council of Canada, utplands Campus
description: The department requires contractors to perform, two projects: building effluent supply pipes with minimum D.I.P. 250mm to extend behind U66 and beyond U66A; replacement of existing heating unit of Building U66 with a new successively lower unit. Replacement of these will allow U66A to remain operational and prevent downtimes. Given the several years current date to installation, they will be allowd to be R-22 type cool Model.
